metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Deploy Django Project - Create zip File
To wrap your project into a .zip file, you cannot zip the entire project folder, but choose the files and folders manually.
content.html: To wrap your project into a .zip file, you cannot zip the entire project folder, but choose the files and folders manually.

content.text: The files to include in the .zip file are highlighted (blue) in the example below:
content.html: The files to include in the .zip file are highlighted (blue) in the example below:

content.code_html:
my_tennis_club
    .ebextensions/
    members/
    my_tennis_club/
    mystaticfiles/
    productionfiles/
    db.sqlite3
    manage.py
    requirements.txt

content.text: With your file explorer, navigate to the project folder, select these files and folders, right-click and choose to create a zip file.
content.html: With your file explorer, navigate to the project folder, select these files and folders, right-click and choose to create a zip file.

content.text: Now you have a .zip file of your project which you can upload to Elastic beanstalk:
content.html: Now you have a .zip file of your project which you can upload to Elastic beanstalk:

content.code:
my_tennis_club

.ebextensions/

members/

my_tennis_club/

mystaticfiles/

productionfiles/

db.sqlite3

manage.py


requirements.txt
content.code_html:
my_tennis_club
    .ebextensions/
    members/
    my_tennis_club/
    mystaticfiles/
    productionfiles/
    db.sqlite3
    manage.py
    my_tennis_clup.zip
    requirements.txt
